comments.body:
Please ask upstream to add the license file to `MANIFEST.in`. Also please add the following here.

```yaml
  # Needs license file in the `sdist`.
  # Waiting on <issue/PR> to be addressed before uncommenting.
  # xref: <issue/PR link>
  # license_file: LICENSE

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  home: https://github.com/avakar/pycson
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  summary: 'A Coffescript Object Notation (CSON) parser for Python 2 and Python 3.'

comments.body: There will be a race condition b/c `speg` is added in this PR together with `cson`. You can just re-start the CIs later though.
